answers.author: Robert Carty
answers.text:
Is one of the prizes for this year's contest a scholarship to ICMA's Annual Conference in San Jose, California?


Is one of the prizes for this year's contest a scholarship to ICMA's Annual Conference in San Jose, California?


Save Changes
Cancel

answers.author: Municipal Meerkat
answers.text:
Why yes!  In fact, all of the prizes for this year's video contest are scholarships to ICMA's Annual Conference in San Jose, CA.  A full description of each scholarship can be found by visiting this link:
http://icma.org/en/Page/100142/2010_ICMA_Video_Contest

author: Municipal Meerkat
text:
Do you want to work, or do you currently work in local government?  Do you want to help promote the local government management profession?  Can you make, or do you have a relevant video you would like to share?
If you answered yes to those questions, we would like to hear from you!  As you may already know, ICMA's 3rd annual video contest is currently underway:
http://icma.org/en/Article/100323/3rd_Annual_ICMA_Video_Contest_Underway__Important_Rules_Inside 
If you aren't able to make a video for the contest but have a relevant video that you'd like to share with ICMA, we invite you let us know by replying to this thread.  For ideas on good videos, check out ICMA's YouTube site at:
http://www.youtube.com/icmavideos
title: Promote the local government management profession - through video!
